channel.title: Problem with whip!

item.title: Problem with whip!
item.dc:creator: @kojomba kojomba
item.description:
@kojomba wrote:

on my server (devolution v7)
that whip are doing 100m times special attack but i want that normal whip attack
i searched on client.java to whip
and i found this

if (wearID == 4151) { // Abyssal Whip playerSEW = 1660; playerSER = 1661; playerSE = 1832; playerSEA = 1658; }

anny1 know how i fix it?

Read full topic
